::Zardus/Striker::

Zardus frowns, looking at Starscream. "Perhaps..."

He looks back at Lavatron, gaining altitude to look the bot in the eyes.

"Excellent. I have a mission for you," he says, "Are you in good enough 
condition to do some killing?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
A surge of electricity went through the bot that used to be Striker as Blaze 
flipped the switch. His optic sensors activated, the cealing coming into 
focus. Running through his data-tracks, the bot found out as much as it could 
about himself.

His name was Slayer. He was a ruthless killer, superior to all but his 
master, Prebon. Slayer slowly sat up, his head turning to look all the bots 
over. Inferior, Slayer thought as he scanned every face in the room, untill 
he came to Prebon's.

Slowly, Slayer got off the table, standing up on the floor next to it. He 
looked at Prebon, hardly bothering to pay any attention to the other bots.

"Master," Slayer said, bowing his head to Prebon.
